messages.message: Hi, I recorded this video to show how i use build and to capture any bits of the UI that is annoying. After a while of editing a project, i’m able to make some elements of the UI crash (its shown right at the end of this video). When this happens is there anything I can capture from the console to help debug this? I’m not yet sure on repro steps. https://www.loom.com/share/544662c7ce1e4b96b93ef10996b85f35

i figured out how to reproduce it!
1. log in as a commercial user
2. create a new field
3. edit the new field
4. click on the results table icon to see the new field’s values across all documents
5. click “Save fields”

this bug currently exists on 24.06 (as Lee found on prod) and 24.08 (I reproduced on preprod)

an even stranger version of this bug exists on aihub-sandbox - somehow the error state isn’t even shown :sob:

fyi @Arjun since this is related to the results table

this is unrelated to your results table refactor though since this bug predates your refactor
fyi @Jessica in case you can think of any reason why the error state suddenly disappears

nvm the panel disappears because `selectedField` becomes undefined, not because of any logic in the error boundary

that causes this line (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/components/Documents/ResultsTable/SingleFieldResultTable.tsx#L123) to return null, so the middle panel disappears
